# CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind

**Enumeration**

The suggestion type that determines how the system handles a suggestion.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SuggestionKind
```

## Overview

Suggestions that the system returns from the query handler have [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSSuggestion/SuggestionKind-swift.enum/default].

## Suggestion types

- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.none**: Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.
- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.custom**: Sorts the custom suggestions together.
- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.default**: Displays the suggestion normally.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Setting suggestion attributes

- **localizedAttributedSuggestion**: An attributed string for the localized suggestion.
- **suggestionKind**: The type of suggestion.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
